channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 14:54 Air alert in Chernihiv region. Follow for further updates.
item.description: 🔴 14:54 Air alert in Chernihiv region. Follow for further updates. #Chernihiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 14:50 Repulse of the alarm in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - Myriv territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community
